title: Velocity of block pulled from rest

content.question: A block of mass <math alttext="m" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>m</mi></math> is pulled from rest along a horizontal surface by a horizontal force whose magnitude is given by the equation <math alttext="F of t equals, A, t, plus B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>F</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mi>A</mi><mi>t</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>B</mi></math>, where <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>A</mi></math> and <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>B</mi></math> are constants with appropriate units. The coefficient of friction between the block and the surface is <math alttext="mu sub k" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>μ</mi><mi>k</mi></msub><mo> </mo></math>. Which expression correctly represents the velocity of the block as a function of time?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction A, t squared, over m, end fraction, plus the fraction B t, over m, end fraction, plus, g times mu sub k, times t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mi>A</mi><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mi>m</mi></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>B</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow><mi>m</mi></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>g</mi><msub><mi>μ</mi><mi>k</mi></msub><mi>t</mi></math>

<math alttext="the fraction A, t squared, over 2 m, end fraction, plus the fraction B t, over m, end fraction, plus, g times mu sub k, times t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mi>A</mi><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>m</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>B</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow><mi>m</mi></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>g</mi><msub><mi>μ</mi><mi>k</mi></msub><mi>t</mi></math>

<math alttext="the fraction A, t squared, over 2 m, end fraction, plus the fraction B t, over m, end fraction, minus, g times mu sub k, times t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mi>A</mi><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>m</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>B</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow><mi>m</mi></mfrac><mo>-</mo><mi>g</mi><msub><mi>μ</mi><mi>k</mi></msub><mi>t</mi></math>

<math alttext="the fraction A, t squared, over 2 m, end fraction, minus the fraction B t, over m, end fraction, minus, g times mu sub k, times t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mi>A</mi><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>m</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>B</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow><mi>m</mi></mfrac><mo>-</mo><mi>g</mi><msub><mi>μ</mi><mi>k</mi></msub><mi>t</mi></math>

<math alttext="the fraction A, t squared, over 2 m, end fraction, minus the fraction B t, over m, end fraction, plus, g times mu sub k, times t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mi>A</mi><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mi>m</mi></mfrac><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>B</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow><mi>m</mi></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mi>g</mi><msub><mi>μ</mi><mi>k</mi></msub><mi>t</mi></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction A, t squared, over 2 m, end fraction, plus the fraction B t, over m, end fraction, minus, g times mu sub k, times t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mi>A</mi><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>m</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>B</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow><mi>m</mi></mfrac><mo>-</mo><mi>g</mi><msub><mi>μ</mi><mi>k</mi></msub><mi>t</mi></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
